title: Throw away less food
description: When throwing away food it winds up in a landfill and produces methane which is a greenhouse gas. When buying food either use it or compost any leftovers.

title: Speak Up
description: No one person can insight change but one person can inform others what they can do to help climate change.

title: Reduce, reuse, repair & recycle
description: To protect out climate, buy fewer things, shop second-hand, repair what you can, and recycle.
